page.title: 19VIEWHILL FARM
page.content: Viewhill Farm,situated in Balloch is owned by Mr.Kiestra.He has 250 acres all grass crops. The land is all fenced and is mainly big fields.He doesn't employ labour but to save him unnecessary work the pony owners help keep the stables clean.Involved in a days work is feeding the animals.Also things like fixing fences and schooling his horses.His tractor etc.are all German made and belongs to the farm.He has many horses but his favourite are Fresians.He has 6 pure bred inculding a Stallion Bjinse.He keeps sheep,poultry,cats and a dog.The farm has a private pony club for his clients who keep their ponies in one of his stables. It costs between Â£200 and Â£600 a year for stabling.You pay livery yearly.
